ghostPost.title: Chatwoot - September Update
ghostPost.html:
Hey everyone,

I'm excited to share the updates for the last month. We were trending on the Github trending list in September.

🔥 New Channels - Line & Telegram

Now you can communicate with your customers from Line & Telegram on Chatwoot.

🔋 DigitalOcean one-click deploys

We now have our One-click app on DigitalOcean marketplace. Checkout Chatwoot one-click installer at https://marketplace.digitalocean.com/apps/chatwoot and deploy Chatwoot easily.

🧑‍💻 Hacktoberfest

We are participating in Hacktoberfest 2021. For those who don't know about Hacktoberfest, it is an annual event conducted by DigitalOcean to promote open-source contributions and build awareness about open-source communities. Look at the guidelines on how to participate in this post.

👥 Community

Our friends at BeeperHQ created a Matrix Beeper bot that logs in as a help user in Matrix and mirrors all messages sent from Matrix into Chatwoot and allows Chatwoot agents to respond.

🤘 Get started

  • Start using Chatwoot on Cloud: https://app.chatwoot.com
  • Spin up a Self-hosted instance: https://www.chatwoot.com/docs/self-hosted
  • Make sure to star us on GitHub
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Subscribe to our YouTube channel
  • Become a sponsor
